PAD_KarlachWasBitten.synopsis: Astarion bit Karlach No Touch in gameplay. Astarion got BURNED, a short dialog between Karlach and Astarion. Several possible lines:1. Party doesn't know that Astarion is a vampire. Astarion is shocked he can't bite Karlach, Karlach is shocked Astarion is a vampire.2. Party knows Astarion is a vampire. Karlach tells him she is too hot for him.
PAD_KarlachWasBitten.how_to_trigger: Start the game as Astarion.Recruit Karlach.Bite her.

PAD.synopsis: Character discovers that Astarion is a vampire while out in the world. (eg. They see him bite someone in combat.)

PAD_GaleWasBitten.synopsis: Astarion bit Gale in gameplay. Astarion got poisoned, a short dialog between Gale and Astarion. Several possible lines:1. Party doesn't know that Astarion is a vampire. Astarion shocked Gale's blood is like bile, Gale shocked Astarion is a vampire.2. Party knows Astarion is a vampire and he tried to bite Gale during a camp night. Gale mocks him a bit - "you don't learn, do you?"3. Party knows Astarion is a vampire, but he hasn't bitten Gale yet. Astarion is surprised by Gale's blood, Gale tells him think before biting other people.
PAD_GaleWasBitten.how_to_trigger: Start the game as Astarion.Recruit Gale.Bite him.

PAD_KarlachWasBitten_0.speaker: Astarion
PAD_KarlachWasBitten_0.text: Agh! It's hot - gods - it's burning!
PAD_KarlachWasBitten_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Party knows Astarion is a vampire, but he hasn't bitten Karlach beforeNodeContext: Just bit Karlach, drinking a small bit of her blood, which is Hot as the Hells (temp wise, not spice wise)

PAD_KarlachWasBitten_2.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachWasBitten_2.text: What the hells did you expect, Astarion? Come on!

PAD_KarlachWasBitten_1.speaker: Astarion
PAD_KarlachWasBitten_1.text: Agh! It's hot - gods - it's burning!
PAD_KarlachWasBitten_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Party doesn't know Astarion is a vampire. Astarion is shocked by Karlach's blood, Karlach is shocked by Astarion being a vampire.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: What in the hells? You're a vampire!

PAD_GaleWasBitten_0.speaker: Astarion
PAD_GaleWasBitten_0.text: Urgh, your blood tastes like bile! What is wrong with you?
PAD_GaleWasBitten_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Party knows Astarion is a vampire, but he hans't tried to bite Gale before.NodeContext: Astarion just tried to bite Gale in gameplay and got a mouthful of his blood, which tastes rotten. He spits it out.

PAD_GaleWasBitten_3.speaker: Gale
PAD_GaleWasBitten_3.text: Serves you right. Next time, ask before you bite.

PAD_GaleWasBitten_1.speaker: Astarion
PAD_GaleWasBitten_1.text: Urgh, your blood tastes like bile! What is wrong with you?
PAD_GaleWasBitten_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Party doesn't know Astarion is a vampire. Astarion is shocked by Gale's blood, Gale is shocked by Astarion being a vampire.NodeContext: Astarion just tried to bite Gale in gameplay and got a mouthful of his blood, which tastes rotten. He spits it out.

PAD_GaleWasBitten_4.speaker: Gale
PAD_GaleWasBitten_4.text: You're one to talk! When exactly were you planning on telling me you were a vampire?

PAD_GaleWasBitten_2.speaker: Gale
PAD_GaleWasBitten_2.text: Learned your lesson yet, Astarion? Some people are best left unbitten.
PAD_GaleWasBitten_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Astarion bit Gale during the camp night. Now Astarion tries to bite Gale during gameplay.
